Text: I've only ever heard one song by D-Day called "Too Young To Date", which was on some 80s comp.  In addition to the track posted here, "Dance It Off", do you have anything else by them?
JonYo, they have an lp that was released in 1983. Dance It Off is off that record.

I found this about them:
http://www.madmartian.com/music_dday.htm
Do you have either of their 7" singles or their one full length album?

Hey again, 80zforever-
Just wanted to say THANK YOU... u have uploaded some truly great material yet again. my favorites from this volume are Zamp Nicall-Music Man and Kids by the English Boys

I'm gonna upload some stuff from my vinyl-vault too so check it out!
regards
JonYo, check out vol 101 for D-Day.

80zforever, you have introduced me to music that I was too young to remember.  I was born in 1981 and do remember the sensibilities of the 80s, but as an adult, I have come to find treasures.  

I respect your choice to probably end it on 50, but you will be missed sorely by many people.  My wife lives in China and loves the music you share.  

The mixes help us locate music from the albums.  Best wishes!

hey 80z thanks again.
i thought vol. 20 was the 'last'? :0
strange ive not heard ONE of all of these series... i suppose theres a reason to call them "hits" in any way, to me they are just "rare" nothing more
